name: Karmen
headline: AI Assistant for Construction Project Managers
description:
Karmen is an AI assistant for construction project managers. We integrate with their emails, project management software and ERPs to automate admin tasks like invoice processing and approvals.

One construction company we are working with faced a project delay cost of around $50,000 a day from an invoicing mistake. Supplier management issues like these account for 20% of project delays.

founders.name: Jonas Ebrahimi, Founder
founders.description: My parents were general contractors, and during university, I gained experience working at JLL. After graduating, I joined IXM and was the youngest commodity trader in their history, primarily working with the European aluminum team. In this role, I managed the delivery of over $1 billion worth of refined aluminum annually, sourced from industrial projects around the globe.

founders.name: Naman Wahi, Founder
founders.description: I hold a Master’s degree specialising in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning from Imperial College London. Previously, I was a software engineer at nPlan, a startup focused on delivering AI solutions for large-scale construction projects with clients such as Shell, ExxonMobil, and Skanska. Drawing on my experience in construction tech, I’m now building Karmen, an AI Assistant for Construction Project Managers.

## Automate your project admin with Karmen
Discover the key benefits of using Karmen to save you time in the day
#### Real Time Updates
Get notifications on change events that cause project delays.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Ulp9RhXYSa5G2UthdUoSprjDqyw.png?scale-down-to=1024)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Ulp9RhXYSa5G2UthdUoSprjDqyw.png?scale-down-to=1024)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Ulp9RhXYSa5G2UthdUoSprjDqyw.png?scale-down-to=1024)
#### EmailOrganisation
Save time trying to flag tasks within your mountain of emails. Karmen organizes all incoming info like POs and invoices.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/JSvZEJMgUMlXHFUWxvoVso43skM.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/JSvZEJMgUMlXHFUWxvoVso43skM.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/JSvZEJMgUMlXHFUWxvoVso43skM.png)
#### Automate your data entry into PM Software
#### Automate your data entry into PM Software
Karmen automatically extracts key details from emails—such as invoice data—and matches them to the appropriate project in your project management software, like Procore. This information can be uploaded without requiring manual data entry.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/QsJ5M8pTjfWlEz740B7xhAC7dOs.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/QsJ5M8pTjfWlEz740B7xhAC7dOs.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/QsJ5M8pTjfWlEz740B7xhAC7dOs.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/QsJ5M8pTjfWlEz740B7xhAC7dOs.png)
#### Subs and Suppliers 
Subcontractors only need to send you an email or text, and Karmen will recognize the information—such as a change order—and input it into your PCO log. All you have to do is review it before sending it to your owner.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/QcrB8KfQe6DkeFvO2SpWhiSyjg.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/QcrB8KfQe6DkeFvO2SpWhiSyjg.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/QcrB8KfQe6DkeFvO2SpWhiSyjg.png)
## Integrated with the tools you use
Our platform integrates with a wide range of applications, including major construction software, allowing you to access all of your project data.

generated_description:
Karmen is an innovative startup focused on revolutionizing the construction industry by providing an AI assistant specifically designed for construction project managers. Founded in 2024 in San Francisco and part of Y Combinator Batch F24, Karmen is an emerging player in the intersection of machine learning and construction management.

The company's primary mission is to streamline administrative tasks that often bog down project managers. Karmen integrates seamlessly with existing emails, project management software, and ERP systems to automate processes like invoice handling and approvals. This kind of automation is crucial; for instance, one construction company faced up to $50,000 in daily costs due to project delays caused by invoicing errors. Supplier management issues contribute to 20% of these delays, highlighting the immense value of Karmen's solution.

On a practical level, Karmen helps users manage invoices, requests for information (RFIs), change orders, and other essential project details directly from their inboxes, saving significant amounts of time—think hours every day that can now be spent on more strategic concerns.

The team currently consists of just two dedicated employees, and the company is under the guidance of David Lieb as its Group Partner. Karmen’s technology also ensures real-time updates on project changes and organizes incoming information such as purchase orders and invoices, greatly enhancing productivity. By automatically extracting key details from emails and matching them to projects, Karmen eliminates the repetitive manual data entry burden and allows project managers to focus on keeping their endeavors on schedule.

With a robust commitment to integration, Karmen supports a variety of popular construction management tools, providing a comprehensive view of all project data in one place. For project managers, it’s like having an additional team member—one who never sleeps and can manage backend tasks efficiently.

To sum it up, Karmen is not just another tech startup; it's a much-needed assistant aimed at tackling the common pain points faced by construction project managers. By automating tedious administrative tasks and enhancing productivity, Karmen is poised to make waves in the construction sector.

For more information, or to see the system in action, you can explore their website at [karmenai.com](https://www.karmenai.com) or book a demo to witness how it can transform the way you manage your projects.
